original: 吳郡富春人，孫氏姻親，孫策、孫權表兄弟。隨孫堅征伐董卓，孫堅戰死後，又輔佐孫策，孫策能平定江東，徐琨居功厥偉。後從孫權討黃祖時，不幸中流矢身亡。
text: Wu Jun Fuchun, Sun family in-laws, Sun Ce and Sun Quan cousins. Following Sun Jian to conquer Dong Zhuo, after Sun Jian died in battle, he assisted Sun Ce, and Sun Ce was able to pacify Jiangdong. Later, when he sought Huang Zu from Sun Quan, he was unfortunately killed.
